name: The Clumsy Knight
description:
Choose your own adventure with this hilarious knighthood adventure.

Go on a wild tale of adventure in search of the lost princess. She has been captured by a dragon and only you can save her. With over 50 scenarios and over 20 ways to die you will be laughing in no time. If you die you can either start over from the beginning or just go back and make another choice. Join us in The Clumsy Knight.
